dt: {bc}crystallized sugar formed by boiling down sugar syrup
{bc}a confection made with sugar and often flavoring and filling
{bc}something that is pleasant or appealing in a light or frivolous way

et: Middle English {it}sugre candy{/it}, partial translation of Middle French {it}sucre candi{/it}, from Old French {it}sucre{/it} sugar + Arabic {it}qandī{/it} candied, from {it}qand{/it} crystallized sugar
shortdef: crystallized sugar formed by boiling down sugar syrup
a confection made with sugar and often flavoring and filling

dt: {bc}to encrust in or coat with sugar
{bc}to cook (something, such as fruit or fruit peel) in a heavy syrup until glazed
{bc}to become coated or encrusted with sugar crystals {bc}become crystallized into sugar

shortdef: to encrust in or coat with sugar; specifically : to cook (something, such as fruit or fruit peel) in a heavy syrup until glazed

dt: {bc}to coat (food) in sugar and often other ingredients (such as flavoring or coloring)
{bc}to make (something that is disagreeable, difficult, or harsh) seem more pleasant, attractive, or acceptable {bc}{sx|sugarcoat||2}

dt.t: Although Capra characterized his films as "Sermons on the Mount," he knew how to {wi}candy-coat{/wi} the morals with laughter.
… I recommended a pair of tours that celebrate the best of Venice's traditions without {wi}candy-coating{/wi} its complexities or exploiting its extremes.
Elsewhere on the album, he {wi}candy-coats{/wi} some of the most hopeless lyrics by adding vocal harmonies …

shortdef: to coat (food) in sugar and often other ingredients (such as flavoring or coloring)
to make (something that is disagreeable, difficult, or harsh) seem more pleasant, attractive, or acceptable : sugarcoat

dt: {bc}covered with sugar and often other ingredients (such as flavoring or coloring)

dt.t: The glorious {wi}candy-coated{/wi} visuals, swooping track design and soaring music haven't aged a day …
If you don't care about the fingerprint sensor, slow-motion video, or improved camera, then maybe the {wi}candy-coated{/wi} colors of the iPhone 5c will be the best fit for you.

dt: {bc}made to seem more pleasant, attractive, or acceptable

dt.t: You seldom see anything but the most {wi}candy-coated{/wi} view of poverty or rural life.
Part of the appeal is its humor is clean enough to take a child to, yet not too {wi}candy-coated{/wi} for adults, reviewers say.
… distrustful of any kind of {wi}candy-coated{/wi} health message …

dt: {bc}having an easy appeal {bc}causing no discomfort, concern, etc.

dt.t: … their songs mostly homed in on undiluted pleasure and {wi}candy-coated{/wi} escapism.

shortdef: covered with sugar and often other ingredients (such as flavoring or coloring)
suggestive of candy; especially : bright like the colors of candy
made to seem more pleasant, attractive, or acceptable

dt: {bc}a usually teenage volunteer worker at a hospital

et: from the striped uniform worn suggesting the stripes on some sticks of candy
shortdef: a usually teenage volunteer worker at a hospital

dt: {bc}an apple that is covered with a sugary mixture that becomes hard

shortdef: an apple that is covered with a sugary mixture that becomes hard

dt: {bc}a stick of hard red and white candy with a curve at the top

shortdef: a stick of hard red and white candy with a curve at the top

dt: {bc}having a pattern of colored stripes and white stripes that look like the stripes on some sticks of candy

shortdef: having a pattern of colored stripes and white stripes that look like the stripes on some sticks of candy

dt: {bc}a young attractive person who accompanies a usually older person at social events

shortdef: a young attractive person who accompanies a usually older person at social events
